The game all the time freezes for me and I have to restart my computer. Any help?

Figured out. You must disable the hardware acceleration of the Adobe flash player. To do so right click while the game is playing then click on the first icon on the bottom. Uncheck the hardware acceleration. If this doesen't help then put the full screen option off.

How to make it save: 
In the game, Right-click on the screen to get to the Adobe Flash Player Settings Tabs, select the little folder icon and make sure the slider is all the way to the right.

PLEASE explain how to save a game properly??

I've read the comments and sliding that bar to the right in the Adobe settings didn't work. I played this game for about 2 hours and am really loving it, now I have to start all over again and I'd hate to give up on it because I can't save! Seems like it should be something so simple to solve...
Nevermind, it turns out setting it to unlimited was a problem.. Rather not slide it all the way to the right, just leave it at 1 or 10MB. Thanks for the up!!!
